author: Romain Racamier-Lafon <romain.racamier@gmail.com>
description: Comparison of different TypeScript result pattern libraries
name: ts-result-comparison

scripts.bench: hyperfine 'bun src/resultx.ts' 'bun src/vanilla-throw.ts' 'bun src/vanilla-object.ts' 'bun src/fluent-type-results.ts' 'bun src/typescript-result.ts'
scripts.bench:node: hyperfine 'node dist/resultx.js' 'node dist/vanilla-throw.js' 'node dist/vanilla-object.js' 'node dist/fluent-type-results.js' 'node dist/typescript-result.js' && echo bench:node success
scripts.check: repo-check && bun check:tsc && bun run build && bun check:once && echo check success
